name: Reed-Doo
description:
Who Do New Hair Doo To Bamboo? You Do!

-

A game I made over a weekend at camp squiggly! @SquigglyRiver

-

This game only uses the mouse

Move the mouse to the side of the screen to access your tools

Use the watering can to grow the bamboo

Use the combs to style it

Use the scissors to cut it as desired

When you are happy, press done to see what they think
